qas.question: How many evangelical churches are there in Paris?
How many parishes of the LDS church are in Paris?
When was the American Church in Paris founded?
What is the principal Anglican church in Paris?

context: Almost all Protestant denominations are represented in Paris, with <a0_0>74<a0_0/> evangelical churches from various denominations, including 21 parishes of the United Protestant Church of France and <a1_0>two<a1_0/> parishes of the Church of Jesus Christ of the Latter-Day Saints. There are several important churches for the English-speaking community: the American Church in Paris, founded in <a2_0>1814<a2_0/>, was the first American church outside the United States; the current church was finished in 1931. The <a3_0>Saint George's Anglican Church<a3_0/> in the 16th arrondissement is the principal Anglican church in the city.
